description: List time sheets exports with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all time sheets exports. Non-admins can list exports scoped by policy: exports tied to brokers they are members of, and exports tied to organizations they belong to (non-broker memberships require manager role).
validation_notes: --organization must be in Type|ID format (e.g., Broker|123). --organization-id requires --organization-type unless --organization-id already includes Type|ID. --status must be one of: processing, processed, failed. --time-sheets expects a comma-separated list of time sheet IDs.

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Filter by organization (format: Type|ID, e.g., Broker|123)

flags.name: --organization-id
flags.description: Filter by organization ID (requires --organization-type or Type|ID)

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.description: Filter by organization type (e.g., Broker, Customer, Trucker)

flags.name: --time-sheets
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of time sheet IDs.
